actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.

actions.committee: House Committee on House Administration by Yea-Nay Vote: 221 - 180  (Record Vote No: 9)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration by Yea-Nay Vote: 221 - 180  (Record Vote No: 9).

actions.in_committee: House Committee on House Administration by Yea-Nay Vote: 221 - 180  (Record Vote No: 9)

official_title: A resolution to conditionally seat Richard D. McIntyre as the Representive from Indiana's Eighth Congressional District.

summary.text: Directs the Speaker of the House to administer the oath of office to Richard D. McIntyre, of Indiana. Refers the question of the final right of Mr. McIntyre to a seat in the 99th Congress to the Committee on House Administration.

titles.title: A resolution to conditionally seat Richard D. McIntyre as the Representive from Indiana's Eighth Congressional District.
